title: IT Engineer,Software,Advanced
description:
**Overview**
 Keysight is at the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our \\~15,000 employees create world\\-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.
   

  

 Our award\\-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry\\-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain full stack web applications using Python, Django, and React
* Build RESTful APIs and integrate them with frontend applications
* Develop responsive, reusable, and scalable UI components using React
* Optimize applications for performance, security, and scalability
* Containerize applications using Docker
* Deploy, manage, and scale applications using Kubernetes
* Collaborate with DevOps, QA, and product teams throughout the SDLC
* Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code
* Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing systems
* Participate in code reviews and follow best engineering practices


**Qualifications**
* Strong proficiency in Python and Django
* Solid experience with React, JavaScript (ES6\\+), HTML5, and CSS3
* Experience building and consuming REST APIs
* Hands\\-on experience with Docker and containerization
* Working knowledge of Kubernetes (deployments, services, pods, scaling)
* Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL) and ORM concepts
* Familiarity with Git and CI/CD pipelines
* Understanding of authentication, authorization, and web security best practices


 Careers Privacy Statement\\*\\*\\*Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\\*\\*\\*

title: Web Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 All in Motion is a dynamic and innovative organization dedicated to transforming the way people approach health, wellness, and fitness. Committed to excellence and continuous improvement, we leverage cutting\\-edge technology and industry best practices to deliver exceptional services and solutions. Our company fosters a collaborative and inclusive work environment where creativity, integrity, and dedication are valued. With a focus on sustainable growth and customer satisfaction, All in Motion strives to make a positive impact on the lives of our clients and community.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced professional to join our team in the role of \\[Job Title]. This position offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to our company's growth by leading key initiatives, managing projects, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in \\[relevant industry or skill area], excellent communication skills, and a proactive approach to problem\\-solving. As a vital member of our organization, you will play a significant role in driving innovation, enhancing operational efficiency, and supporting our mission to promote health and wellness.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The successful candidate should possess a minimum of \\[X] years of relevant experience in \\[industry or specific field]. A bachelor’s degree in \\[relevant discipline] is required, with advanced degrees or certifications preferred. Demonstrated expertise in \\[specific skills or tools], along with a solid understanding of industry standards and best practices, is essential. Strong leadership and interpersonal skills are necessary to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders at all levels. Additionally, the candidate should demonstrate adaptability, a keen attention to detail, and a passion for continuous learning and professional development.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing and executing various projects aligned with the company's strategic objectives. Your key responsibilities will include developing project plans, setting timelines, and coordinating resources to ensure timely delivery. You will work closely with internal teams and external partners to ensure seamless communication and execution of initiatives. Monitoring project progress, identifying risks, and implementing corrective measures will be vital to maintaining quality standards. You will also be expected to analyze data, prepare reports, and present findings to senior management to inform decision\\-making processes. Additionally, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that enhance our service offerings and operational workflows. Ensuring compliance with industry regulations and company policies will be an ongoing aspect of your role.
   

  

**Benefits**
 All in Motion offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees’ health, well\\-being, and professional growth. This includes competitive salary packages, health insurance plans, retirement savings options, and paid time off. We also provide opportunities for ongoing training and development, including workshops, certifications, and industry conferences. Our organization promotes a healthy work\\-life balance through flexible working arrangements and wellness programs. Additionally, employees enjoy a collaborative and inclusive workplace culture that encourages innovation, recognition, and career advancement.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 All in Motion is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where diversity is celebrated and all individuals are treated with respect and fairness. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances our creativity and drives our success, and we are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities to all qualified candidates.

title: Frontend UI Developer
description:

title: QA Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 SuperAGI is pioneering the future of Artificial General Intelligence with groundbreaking research and innovative AI products. Our mission is to transform the future of applications through intelligent, autonomous solutions that drive unparalleled efficiency and growth. We are building a world where AI and human intelligence collaborate seamlessly to achieve extraordinary outcomes. If you are passionate about AI and eager to be part of a team that is shaping the future, SuperAGI is the place for you.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled Senior Manual QA professional to join our quality assurance team. Immediate joiners are preferred. The ideal candidate should possess excellent analytical skills, a strong understanding of product perspectives, and a passion for ensuring high\\-quality software delivery. As a Manual Tester, you will play a crucial role in our product development process, ensuring that our software meets the highest standards of quality and performance. You will collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams, including developers and product managers, to ensure comprehensive testing and defect resolution. Your role will be vital in maintaining our commitment to delivering reliable, efficient, and user\\-friendly AI solutions that meet both technical specifications and user expectations.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
* 2\\-3 years of experience in manual testing, with a proven track record of delivering high\\-quality software
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to think from both a user and product perspective
* Experience in creating detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test cases
* Excellent understanding of the software development life cycle (SDLC) and testing methodologies
* Hands\\-on experience with various testing tools and techniques
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team, demonstrating a strong sense of ownership and accountability
* Detail\\-oriented with a focus on delivering high\\-quality products in a fast\\-paced environment
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal


**Responsibilities**
* Develop, execute, and maintain comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts to ensure thorough testing of our products.
* Perform functional, regression, integration, and user acceptance testing to identify and report defects.
* Collaborate with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand product requirements and ensure that the testing covers all critical aspects.
* Analyze test results, identify issues, and provide clear and concise feedback to the development team.
* Ensure timely and accurate reporting of test results and defects using test management tools.
* Focus on process\\-oriented testing while maintaining agility and speed in test execution.
* Drive continuous improvement in testing processes and methodologies to enhance product quality.
* Debug and understand failures in automation code, demonstrating strong failure debugging skills to support manual testing efforts.


**Benefits**
 At SuperAGI, we value our employees and strive to provide a comprehensive benefits package that supports your professional and personal growth. We offer competitive salary packages aligned with industry standards, along with health insurance coverage to ensure your well\\-being. Our employees enjoy flexible working hours and remote work options to promote work\\-life balance. We also provide opportunities for continuous learning through training programs, workshops, and conferences. Additionally, employees have access to a collaborative and innovative work environment where their ideas and contributions are valued. We believe in recognizing and rewarding excellence, fostering a culture of growth and achievement.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 SuperAGI is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that diversity and inclusion are essential to our success and strive to foster a workplace where everyone feels valued, respected, and empowered to contribute their best. We are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities and ensuring a fair and equitable hiring process for all candidates.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 SuMeera Solutions is an innovative technology company dedicated to transforming regulatory compliance through cutting\\-edge software solutions. Our flagship product, CompliEase, is an AI\\-powered compliance SaaS platform designed to simplify complex regulations by converting them into structured rules, APIs, workflows, and dashboards. We are committed to leveraging advanced technologies to help organizations meet their compliance requirements efficiently and effectively. Our team is composed of passionate professionals who thrive on solving challenging problems and delivering high\\-quality solutions that make a tangible impact.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Software Engineer to join our dynamic team remotely within India. This role is pivotal in shaping the core backend architecture and platform infrastructure for CompliEase. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in backend development, platform engineering, and DevOps practices, with a proven ability to work independently and deliver results with minimal supervision. You will be directly involved in critical modules, including OSHA compliance features, and will play a key role in stabilizing and scaling our platform to support growing customer demands.
   

  

 This position requires immediate contribution, so we are looking for someone with substantial professional industry experience. If your background primarily includes college projects, internships, or self\\-learning initiatives without extensive professional exposure, this role may not be suitable. We value hands\\-on expertise and a proactive approach to problem\\-solving.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Minimum of 5\\+ years of backend and platform engineering experience in a production environment.
* Strong proficiency in API design and backend development using Python (FastAPI) or Node.js.
* Hands\\-on experience with AWS ECS deployment, including Docker, IAM, and environment configuration.
* Proficiency in CI/CD pipelines, preferably using GitHub Actions or equivalent tools.
* Solid understanding of PostgreSQL, including schema design, migrations, indexing, and performance optimization.
* Experience with system design patterns such as RBAC, multi\\-tenancy, audit logging, and worker\\-based architectures.
* Excellent debugging skills and a proven ability to ship reliable fixes confidently.


**Responsibilities**
* Enhance and maintain CI/CD pipelines and DevOps processes for deploying OSHA 300 backend services on AWS ECS.
* Integrate OSHA 300 compliance modules seamlessly into the main application deployment flow.
* Develop and optimize endpoints and services for serious incident tracking, including dependencies, dashboards, and analytics, while extending the data model as needed.
* Address and resolve bugs identified during testing phases to ensure platform stability and reliability.
* Implement solutions for known gaps such as PDF export functionalities, deadline management, and handling orphaned or missing incident data.
* Design and develop middleware to support multi\\-tenant environments with RBAC, ensuring secure and scalable user and organization management.
* Implement comprehensive audit logging to track user activities and system changes for compliance and troubleshooting purposes.
* Strengthen API security by applying rate limiting, CORS policies, and authentication best practices.
* Build and maintain OSHA data ingestion systems, including APIs for data sources, worker information, processing pipelines, and schema updates.
* Develop OSHA ITA submission capabilities, managing APIs, data processing, and schema portability, integrating with Terraform\\-based client initialization processes.


**Benefits**
 Joining SuMeera Solutions offers an excellent opportunity to work remotely within a flexible environment, promoting work\\-life balance. We provide competitive full\\-time employment benefits, including ESOPs, to ensure our team members share in the company’s growth and success. You will have the chance to work on innovative projects that have a tangible impact on regulatory compliance, utilizing the latest technologies and methodologies. Our collaborative culture encourages continuous learning and professional development, supported by a team of passionate professionals dedicated to excellence.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 SuMeera Solutions is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that diverse teams foster innovation and drive better outcomes, and we welcome applicants from all backgrounds to apply for this role.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Aquila Digital Energy Solutions Pvt. Ltd. is a technology\\-driven subsidiary of Aquila Engineering LLC, dedicated to delivering cutting\\-edge digital solutions across a diverse range of industries including Aviation, Oil \\& Gas, Manufacturing, Mining, and Real\\-Time Systems. Our company specializes in developing scalable, secure, and high\\-performance applications that support mission\\-critical operations, ensuring our clients achieve operational excellence through innovative technology. We pride ourselves on our commitment to quality, agility, and continuous improvement, fostering a collaborative environment that encourages professional growth and technological innovation.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a highly skilled Full Stack Web Developer with extensive experience in Angular and Node.js to join our dynamic engineering team. This role involves developing modern, responsive web applications and building robust backend services that integrate seamlessly with front\\-end components. The ideal candidate will be responsible for translating business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring high\\-quality deliverables, and collaborating effectively with cross\\-functional teams in an agile environment. This position offers an excellent opportunity to work on innovative projects that have a tangible impact on critical industry operations, providing a platform for professional growth and technical excellence.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a strong educational background with a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. They should have at least four years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer, demonstrating proficiency in both front\\-end and back\\-end development. Candidates must have hands\\-on experience with Angular, Node.js, and Express.js, along with a solid understanding of RESTful API development and GraphQL. Familiarity with relational databases, ORM tools like Sequelize, and version control systems such as Git is essential. Experience with CI/CD pipelines, particularly in Azure, is highly desirable. Candidates should also have a good understanding of the MEAN/MERN stack concepts, although MongoDB is not currently in use at our organization. Strong problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work collaboratively in a fast\\-paced environment are crucial for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain responsive front\\-end applications using Angular, including designing components, modules, services, routing, and state management to ensure a seamless user experience.
* Build and optimize backend services and APIs using Node.js and Express.js, implementing core business logic, authentication, authorization, data validation, and error handling to ensure reliability and security.
* Design and expose APIs using REST and/or GraphQL, facilitating communication between front\\-end interfaces and backend systems, and enabling integration with other enterprise systems.
* Work with relational databases and ORM tools such as Sequelize, including schema design, query optimization, and data management to maintain data integrity and performance.
* Implement database best practices through migrations, transactions, and data validation to ensure consistency and accuracy of data.
* Write clean, modular, and maintainable code, complemented by comprehensive unit and integration tests, documentation, and active participation in code reviews to uphold quality standards.
* Collaborate closely with UI/UX designers, QA engineers, product managers, and fellow developers to translate complex business requirements into effective technical solutions.
* Participate in agile development cycles, including sprint planning, task estimation, and timely delivery of features, while continuously seeking areas for process improvement.
* Optimize application performance, scalability, and security, adhering to industry best practices and emerging technologies to ensure robust and future\\-proof solutions.


**Benefits**
 Aquila Engineering offers a competitive compensation package aligned with industry standards, with an annual salary range of INR 19\\-23 LPA (approximately USD 21K\\-23K). We provide a comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, paid leave, and opportunities for professional development. Our flexible work arrangements, including on\\-site and hybrid options, support work\\-life balance. Employees are encouraged to participate in ongoing training and skill enhancement programs. Additionally, being part of a forward\\-thinking organization, you will have the chance to work on innovative projects with a talented team committed to excellence and continuous learning.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Aquila Engineering is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that a diverse workforce fosters innovation and drives our success, and we are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities to all qualified candidates.

title: Java Web Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 MetBrains Inc. is a leading global EdTech platform dedicated to transforming the way learners access knowledge and skills. With a focus on innovative, technology\\-driven solutions, MetBrains aims to create engaging, personalized, and effective learning experiences for users worldwide. The company leverages cutting\\-edge technology and pedagogical strategies to develop platforms that foster mentorship, collaboration, and lifelong learning. As part of its strategic expansion, MetBrains is strengthening its presence in India, seeking talented professionals to join its dynamic team and contribute to its mission of democratizing education through scalable digital solutions.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled Java Developer to join MetBrains Inc. as part of our expanding Indian team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust backend applications that power our learning platform. This role requires a proactive individual who can collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams including product managers, frontend developers, and DevOps engineers to deliver high\\-quality, scalable solutions. The Java Developer will play a critical role in enhancing platform performance, reliability, and security, directly impacting learner engagement and mentor effectiveness. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work in a fast\\-paced, impact\\-driven environment that values innovation, continuous learning, and collaboration.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Candidates must have substantial experience in backend development using Java, with proficiency in frameworks such as Spring, Spring Boot, or Hibernate. A solid understanding of object\\-oriented programming principles, data structures, and system design is essential. Familiarity with REST API development and integration, along with experience working with databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB, is required. Knowledge of version control systems such as Git is also necessary. Additional skills in microservices architecture, cloud computing, and containerization are considered advantageous. The candidate should demonstrate strong problem\\-solving abilities, analytical thinking, and the capacity to work independently in a remote, global team environment. An interest in education technology and building impactful learning platforms is highly desirable.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The key responsibilities for this role include designing, developing, testing, and maintaining backend applications using Java. The developer will write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following industry best practices. Building and maintaining RESTful APIs and backend services is a core aspect of the role. The candidate will collaborate closely with frontend teams, product managers, and DevOps engineers to deliver reliable and scalable solutions. Participating in system design discussions, architecture planning, and code reviews is essential to ensure high\\-quality output. The developer will optimize application performance, scalability, and reliability while troubleshooting and resolving issues in production environments. Ensuring application security, data protection, and adherence to coding standards is critical. The role also involves working with databases, optimizing queries, and contributing to continuous process improvements. Staying updated with the latest Java technologies and industry trends is vital to keep our platform innovative and competitive.
   

  

**Benefits**
 MetBrains Inc. offers a fully remote working environment across India, providing flexibility and work\\-life balance. Employees will have the opportunity to work with a global EdTech platform that impacts learners worldwide and contributes to the company's growth in India. The role comes with a competitive compensation package aligned with experience and expertise. Employees will be part of an impact\\-driven organization where their work directly influences learner success and educational outcomes. The company fosters a supportive, collaborative, and growth\\-oriented culture that encourages continuous learning, innovation, and professional development. Additionally, team members will have access to various learning resources, mentorship opportunities, and participation in exciting projects that shape the future of education technology.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 MetBrains Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where all employees and applicants are treated with respect and fairness. We value diversity and do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, religion, or any other characteristic protected by law. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances creativity, innovation, and overall organizational success. All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply regardless of their background or personal characteristics. We are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities and ensuring a workplace free from discrimination and harassment.

title: Senior Software Engineer III
description:
**Description**
* About Snapmint.
* Snapmint is on a mission of democratising no/low\\-cost instalment purchases for next 200 Mn Indians.
* Of the 300 million credit eligible consumers in India, less than 30 Mn actively use credit cards.
* Snapmint is reinventing credit for the next 200 Mn consumers by providing them freedom to buy what they want and pay for them in instalments without a credit card.
* In a short period of time Snapmint has reached over a million consumers in 2200 cities and has powered over 2000 crores worth of purchases.

**About Role**

* You will work closely with product management, front\\-end engineers, and other cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality solutions while ensuring alignment with the companys technical and business goals.


**Expereince :** 
 5\\-8 Years.
   

  

**Location :**

**Working Arrangement :**

**Key Responsibilities**
* Own and drive the design and architecture of complex backend systems.

* Make architecture\\-level decisions with cross\\-team impact.
* Ensure system scalability, reliability, and security at scale.
* Collaborate with stakeholders (product, infra, business) to align technical goals.
* Conduct deep design and code reviews, and enforce standards.
* Mentor junior engineers (SDE\\-1/2\\).


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* 5\\-8 years of experience in backend development with a proven track record of leading engineering teams.
* Strong experience with backend language ie. Node. js.
* Experience working with databases (SQL, NoSQL), caching systems, and RESTful APIs.
* Bachelors degree in Engineering (BE/BTech) or related technical field.
* Hands\\-on experience designing and scaling backend services and APIs.
* Proven ability to own large systems end\\-to\\-end with minimal oversight.

title: IT Engineer,Software,Expert
description:
**Overview**
 Keysight is at the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our \\~15,000 employees create world\\-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.
   

  

 Our award\\-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry\\-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 IT is hiring a DevOps Engineer to bolster our Engineering Tools COE Team’s engagement with the R\\&D community. This role will focus on engineering and supporting Keysight’s R\\&D DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate will be able to collaborate and influence effectively with diverse Keysight development teams and be able to define scope and high\\-level technical plans and deliverables. This position requires a bachelor's degree in computer science and at least 10 years of experience in .NET development. You should be a team player and an excellent communicator, be able to write functional code, and have a sharp eye for spotting errors. Please add if needed.
   

  

* Implement and design platforms using .NET coding languages
* Revise, refactor, update, and debug code
* Collaborate with internal teams to design, create, and maintain software
* Create documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC)
* Test and deploy prototypes, applications, systems, user interfaces, and client displays
* Coordinate with other software developers and professionals

* Knowledge of Visual Basic.NET, C\\#, and CSS3/HTML5
* Knowledge of client\\-side technology for building user interfaces, such as HTML, Angular or other JS Framework, and CSS
* Knowledge of RPC and REST application programming interfaces (APIs)
* Experience with the Atlassian stack
* Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework and architectural/design patterns like Model\\-View\\-Controller (MVC)
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies, such as Scrum and Kanban
* Understanding of database applications, such as NoSQL, SQL Server, and Oracle
* Ability to work independently with minimal supervision


**Qualifications**
 Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in a technical topic e.g. Computer Science. Master’s degree preferred
   

  

* Minimum 10 years of .NET development experience
* Languages: ASP.NET, C\\#.Net, VB.net, ASP.NET MVC, .NET Core, Entity Framework, SQL\\-PL
* Front\\-end: HTML5, CSS, Angular, JavaScript
* Services: ASP.NET Web API and Windows Services, SOAP, JSON, REST API

* 7\\+ years of Linux or Windows system administration experience

title: Data Scientist
description:
Position Description
   

  

 Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest independent IT and business consulting services firms in the world. With 94,000 consultants and professionals across the globe, CGI delivers an end\\-to\\-end portfolio of capabilities, from strategic IT and business consulting to systems integration, managed IT and business process services and intellectual property solutions. CGI works with clients through a local relationship model complemented by a global delivery network that helps clients digitally transform their organizations and accelerate results. CGI Fiscal 2024 reported revenue is CA$14\\.68 billion and CGI shares are listed on the TSX (GIB.A) and the NYSE (GIB). Learn more at cgi.com.
   

  

 Job Title: Data Science
   

  

 Position: Senior Software Engineer
   

  

 Experience: 7 \\- 12 Years
   

  

 Category: Software Development/ Engineering
   

  

 Shift: Hybrid
   

  

 Main location: India,Hyderabad
   

  

 Position ID: J1225\\-1536
   

  

 Employment Type: Full Time
   

  

 Education Qualification: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field or higher with minimum 6 years of relevant experience.
   

  

 Position Description: We are seeking a highly experienced and innovative Senior AI Engineer to join our rapidly expanding AI/ML team. With 7\\+ years of hands\\-on experience, you will be instrumental in the end\\-to\\-end lifecycle of AI/ML solutions – from research and prototyping to developing, deploying, and maintaining production\\-grade intelligent systems. You will work on challenging problems, collaborate closely with data scientists, product managers, and software engineers, and drive the adoption of cutting\\-edge AI technologies across our platforms.
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

 Model Development \\& Implementation: Design, develop, train, and optimize robust and scalable machine learning models (e.g., deep learning, classical ML algorithms) for various applications.
   

  

* Production Deployment (MLOps): Build and maintain end\\-to\\-end MLOps pipelines for model deployment, monitoring, versioning, and retraining, ensuring reliability and performance in production environments.
* Data Engineering for AI: Work with large, complex datasets, performing data cleaning, feature engineering, and data pipeline development to prepare data for model training and inference.
* Research \\& Prototyping: Explore and evaluate new AI/ML technologies, algorithms, and research papers to identify opportunities for innovation and competitive advantage. Rapidly prototype and test new ideas.
* Performance Optimization: Optimize AI/ML models and inference systems for speed, efficiency, and resource utilization.
* Collaboration \\& Communication: Partner closely with Data Scientists to transition research prototypes into production\\-ready solutions. Collaborate with Software Engineers to integrate AI models into existing products and platforms. Communicate complex AI concepts to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Code Quality \\& Best Practices: Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code. Advocate for and implement software engineering best practices within the AI/ML lifecycle.
* Monitoring \\& Maintenance: Implement robust monitoring for model performance, data drift, and system health in production, and troubleshoot issues as they arise.


**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 Must\\-Have Skills:
   

  

* 7\\+ years of hands\\-on experience as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer, or a similar role focused on building and deploying AI/ML solutions.
* Strong proficiency in Python and its relevant ML/data science libraries (e.g., NumPy, Pandas, Scikit\\-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
* Extensive experience with at least one major deep learning framework such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras.
* Solid understanding of machine learning principles, algorithms (e.g., regression, classification, clustering, ensemble methods), and statistical modeling.
* Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Azure ML, Vertex AI).
* Proven experience with MLOps concepts and tools for model lifecycle management (e.g., MLflow, Kubeflow, Sagemaker MLOps, Azure ML Pipelines).
* Strong SQL skills for data manipulation, analysis, and feature extraction from relational databases.
* Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and handling large datasets.


 Good\\-to\\-Have Skills:
   

  

* Familiarity with software development best practices including version control (Git), code reviews, and CI/CD.


 CGI is an equal opportunity employer. In addition, CGI is committed to providing accommodation for people with disabilities in accordance with provincial legislation. Please let us know if you require reasonable accommodation due to a disability during any aspect of the recruitment process and we will work with you to address your needs.
   

  

**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well\\-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: Data Scientist
description:
**About The Company**
 Birlasoft is a global digital and enterprise software development company that combines technology, expertise, and innovation to deliver comprehensive solutions across various industries. With a rich history of over a century, Birlasoft has established itself as a trusted partner for organizations seeking to transform their business operations through cutting\\-edge technology. The company specializes in digital transformation, enterprise applications, data analytics, and AI\\-driven solutions, empowering clients to achieve greater efficiency, agility, and competitive advantage. Birlasoft’s commitment to innovation and excellence is reflected in its diverse portfolio, global presence, and dedicated team of technology professionals who work relentlessly to solve complex business challenges.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a highly skilled Data Scientist with a focus on AI Agent Development to join our dynamic team in India. This role is pivotal in designing, building, and deploying intelligent autonomous agents capable of operating within complex digital environments. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, machine learning, and software development, with a keen interest in developing innovative solutions that leverage large language models (LLMs), multi\\-agent systems, and simulation frameworks. You will work closely with cross\\-functional teams including research, engineering, product management, and DevOps to create scalable and robust AI agents that enhance automation, decision\\-making, and user engagement. The role offers an exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of AI innovation, contributing to transformative projects that impact various industries and business functions.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a bachelor’s or master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field. You should have a minimum of 6 to 8 years of relevant experience in AI and data science, with a proven track record of developing AI\\-driven applications. Strong programming skills in Python are essential, along with experience using AI/ML libraries such as LangChain, OpenAI API, Hugging Face, or similar frameworks. Familiarity with agent\\-based modeling, multi\\-agent systems, reinforcement learning, and generative AI models is required. Additionally, experience with API development, backend services, deployment pipelines, and cloud platforms, especially Azure, will be advantageous. The ability to work independently in fast\\-paced, experimental environments and excellent problem\\-solving skills are critical for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design and implement AI agents utilizing large language models, planning algorithms, and decision\\-making frameworks to support autonomous operations.
* Develop scalable agent architectures that facilitate interactivity, reasoning, planning, and task execution in dynamic environments.
* Integrate AI agents into various applications, APIs, or workflows, including chatbots, copilots, automation tools, and other enterprise solutions.
* Collaborate with research teams, engineers, and product managers to enhance agent capabilities through iterative development and experimentation.
* Implement feedback mechanisms, reinforcement learning, and user interaction data to optimize agent behavior and performance.
* Monitor, evaluate, and fine\\-tune agent systems to ensure robustness, safety, and compliance with AI governance standards.
* Document agent logic, design decisions, dependencies, and operational procedures thoroughly for maintainability and knowledge sharing.


**Benefits**
 Birlasoft offers a competitive compensation package along with comprehensive benefits designed to support your professional and personal growth. Employees enjoy health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off. The company promotes a collaborative and innovative work environment that encourages continuous learning through training programs, certifications, and participation in industry conferences. Flexible work arrangements, including options for remote work, are available to promote work\\-life balance. Additionally, Birlasoft provides opportunities for career advancement through internal mobility and leadership development initiatives. As part of our team, you will have access to cutting\\-edge technologies and the chance to work on impactful projects that shape the future of AI and digital transformation.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Birlasoft is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that diverse perspectives foster innovation and drive better outcomes, and we are dedicated to providing a workplace where everyone can thrive and contribute to our shared success.

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital – OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master’s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Lead, SW Eng - Northern Trust
description:
**About Northern Trust:**
 Northern Trust, a Fortune 500 company, is a globally recognized, award\\-winning financial institution that has been in continuous operation since 1889\\.
   

  

 Northern Trust is proud to provide innovative financial services and guidance to the world's most successful individuals, families, and institutions by remaining true to our enduring principles of service, expertise, and integrity. With more than 130 years of financial experience and over 22,000 partners, we serve the world's most sophisticated clients using leading technology and exceptional service.
   

  

 Northern Trust is looking for a
 **Lead Software Engineer** 
 to join its Technology Development Centre in Pune, India in the Investment Management team. This individual as part of an Agile development team, will be responsible for analysis and design of Multi Asset business platform that meet business and technical requirements.
   

  

**Major Duties :**
 Analyse and build the requirements for Multi Asset Quant businesses of NT Asset Management
   

  

 Ensure code meets standards and tested appropriate to the platform
   

  

 Provide technical guidance to the development team and deliver as per business needs
   

  

 A team player with an ability to own the design and code as per requirement given.
   

  

 Communicate status (written and verbal) to project team and management
   

  

 Continuously looks for ways to improve the application's stability, scalability and user experience
   

  

**Experience/ Skills:**
 BS in Computer Science, Engineering, or Information Technology
   

  

 8\\-12 years experienced Python consultant who will be responsible for design and develop highly efficient, scalable and customizable reporting solutions using on premises and external sources.
   

  

 Experience in Quant based libraries and algorithms
   

  

 Experience in multi\\-tiered, complex system design \\& architecture
   

  

**Required Skills :**
 Excellent knowledge of SDLC and Agile development practices
   

  

 Expert level knowledge of Python 3, Pandas, NumPy.
   

  

 Experience on Data Analysis using Python 3
   

  

 Strong experience in developing Fast API based backend APIs
   

  

 Expert level understanding of developing native cloud applications \\- preferably Azure
   

  

 Expertise in Implementing API driven Micro services
   

  

 Experience in implementing security best practices to API platform \\- Oauth/SAML, Encryptions, masking etc.
   

  

 Expert level understanding of writing automated unit test cases.
   

  

 Experience in Asynch processing /Batch streaming to handle high volume data.
   

  

 Knowledge of testing methodologies. Experience in Automate code releases and redundant tasks using Shell/Python scripting.
   

  

 Manage permissions, backup and performance across different databases like MySQL, MSSQL, Postgres etc
   

  

 Experience with building interfaces to Data Lakes, Operational Data Stores and Enterprise Datawarehouse.
   

  

 Expert knowledge of SQL and related SQL procedure languages.
   

  

 Design, develop and use data structures and data marts to support reporting.
   

  

 Good analytical and problem\\-solving skills
   

  

 Both attention to detail \\& ability to rise above details to see broader implications \\& recommend strategic solutions
   

  

 Self\\-starter; Positive \\& adaptable in a continually changing environment
   

  

 Ability to work independently and with a team
   

  

 Proven interpersonal and communication skills with technical \\& business partners
   

  

 Strong understanding of building CI/CD pipelines for change management.
   

  

 Preferred/ Recommended Skills:
   

  

 Familiarity with Banking/Financial domain
   

  

 Financial domain knowledge \\- Investment Management, portfolio construction and risk management.
   

  

 Experience on Quant based libraries and building CAPM based models
   

  

 Worked on project streamlining the testing process by introducing automation, leveraging tools and setting goals to reduce time and effort.
   

  

**Working with Us:**
 As a Northern Trust partner, greater achievements await. You will be part of a flexible and collaborative work culture in an organization where financial strength and stability is an asset that emboldens us to explore new ideas.
   

  

 Movement within the organization is encouraged, senior leaders are accessible, and you can take pride in working for a company committed to assisting the communities we serve! Join a workplace with a greater purpose.
   

  

 We'd love to learn more about how your interests and experience could be a fit with one of the world's most admired and sustainable companies! Build your career with us and apply today. \\#MadeForGreater
   

  

**Reasonable accommodation**
 Northern Trust is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please email our HR Service Center at MyHRHelp@ntrs.com .
   

  

 We hope you're excited about the role and the opportunity to work with us. We value an inclusive workplace and understand flexibility means different things to different people.
   

  

 Apply today and talk to us about your flexible working requirements and together we can achieve greater.
   

  

**About Our Pune Office**
 The Northern Trust Pune office, established in 2016, is now home to over 3,000 employees. The office handles various functions, including Operations for Asset Servicing and Wealth Management, as well as delivering critical technology solutions that support business operations across the globe.
   

  

 Our Pune team takes our commitment to service to heart. In 2024, they volunteered more than 10,000\\+ hours into the communities where they live and work. Learn more.

title: Sr. Salesforce Developer FSC
description:
This is a remote position.
   

  

 Position\\- Sr. Salesforce Developer FSC
   

  

 Location \\- Any/Remote work
   

  

 working Days\\- 5 Working Mode \\- Remote
   

  

**Mandatory:** 
 FSC certification \\+ extensive FSC project experience.
   

  

**Alternative Option:** 
 Omnistudio\\-certified candidates with strong JavaScript and relevant project experience. Certifications are mandatory.
   

  

**Job Description – Sr. Salesforce Developer (FSC)**
 We are looking for a
 **Sr. Salesforce Developer (FSC)** 
 with strong expertise in Salesforce development (Apex, AURA, LWC, Admin, Security, Data Sharing), solid integration experience, proficiency in Postman/Swagger, and the ability to understand Apex/Trigger/Integration patterns and debug complex code.
   

  

* FSC (Financial Services Cloud) certification and experience mandatory
* Strong Salesforce development: Apex, AURA, LWC, Admin, Security, Data Sharing, App Builder
* Integration experience (API, services)
* Hands\\-on with Postman \\& Swagger for integration testing
* Understanding of middleware tools: Jitterbit, MuleSoft
* Ability to understand and write Apex/Trigger/Integration patterns
* Strong debugging skills for complex code
* Certifications: Admin, PD1 (mandatory), PD2 (added advantage)
* OmniStudio experience is an added advantage

title: Lead Azure Databricks Developer
description:
Position Description
   

  

 At CGI, we’re a team of builders. We call our employees members because all who join CGI are building their own company \\- one that has grown to 72,000 professionals located in 40 countries. Founded in 1976, CGI is a leading IT and business process services firm committed to helping clients succeed. We have the global resources, expertise, stability and dedicated professionals needed to achieve. At CGI, we’re a team of builders. We call our employees members because all who join CGI are building their own company \\- one that has grown to 72,000 professionals located in 40 countries. Founded in 1976, CGI is a leading IT and business process services firm committed to helping clients succeed. We have the global resources, expertise, stability and dedicated professionals needed to achieve results for our clients \\- and for our members. Come grow with us. Learn more at www.cgi.com.
   

  

 This is a great opportunity to join a winning team. CGI offers a competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and professional development. Benefits for full\\-time, permanent members start on the first day of employment and include a paid time\\-off program and profit participation and stock purchase plans. We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position, however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted. No unsolicited agency referrals please.
   

  

 Job Title: Azure Databricks Engineer
   

  

 Position: Software Engineer / Senior Software Engineer
   

  

 Experience: 8 \\- 15 Years
   

  

 Category: Lead Analyst / Engineering
   

  

 Main location: India, Bangalore / Hyderabad / Chennai
   

  

 Position ID:J0925\\-0251
   

  

 Employment Type: Full Time
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

 Lead data bricks developer with 8\\-15 years of experience
   

  

 We are seeking a skilled Azure Databricks Developer to design, develop, and optimize big data pipelines using Databricks on Azure. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in PySpark, Azure Data Lake, and data engineering best practices in a cloud environment.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

 Design and implement ETL/ELT pipelines using Azure Databricks and PySpark.
   

  

 Work with structured and unstructured data from diverse sources (e.g., ADLS Gen2, SQL DBs, APIs).
   

  

 Optimize Spark jobs for performance and cost\\-efficiency.
   

  

 Collaborate with data analysts, architects, and business stakeholders to understand data needs.
   

  

 Develop reusable code components and automate workflows using Azure Data Factory (ADF).
   

  

 Implement data quality checks, logging, and monitoring.
   

  

 Participate in code reviews and adhere to software engineering best practices.
   

  

 Required Skills \\& Qualifications:
   

  

 5\\+ years of experience in Apache Spark / PySpark.
   

  

 5\\+ years working with Azure Databricks and Azure Data Services (ADLS Gen2, ADF, Synapse).
   

  

 Strong understanding of data warehousing, ETL, and data lake architectures.
   

  

 Proficiency in Python and SQL.
   

  

 Experience with Git, CI/CD tools, and version control practices.
   

  

**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 Skill : ABD, ADL, Pyspark
   

  

 Exp : 8 to 15 Yrs
   

  

**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well\\-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.
